name: DON'T DIE!
description: Find a key...Open the door.TRY DON'T DIE!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer Processor: An Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with latest drivers Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor or later that's SSE2 capable Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers, at least 512 MB of dedicated video memory Storage: 200 MB available space
